tutorial.speak:
Let's set up plans in Chums. First, click on the Plans icon in the navigation menu.
Click the Add Plan button to create a new plan.
Enter a name for your plan and select the start date.
Choose the ministries that will be part of this plan.
For each ministry, select the teams that will be involved.
Now, let's add volunteers to the teams. Click on a team to see its members.
Click the Add Volunteer button to assign people to this team.
Search for and select the volunteers you want to add.
Set the role for each volunteer in the team.
Click Save to add the volunteers to the team.
Repeat this process for each team in your plan.
Once all teams have their volunteers assigned, click Save Plan.
Your plan is now set up! Volunteers will be notified of their assignments.
